channel.title: nova on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in nova on Barefoot Rob

item.title: Former student now present student
item.description: ##11:32 Tuesday 24 March 2015 JST## Actually I don’t know if she’ll be here, but one of my former students at Nova contacted me on FB saying that she’s in the Tuesday version of my Thursday class with GG. Well, I’m teaching the Tuesday lesson today at 12, so I may see her soon! I don’t honestly remember her just from FB photo, but we’ll see if some memories return after actually chatting with her.
